description: Prescribed perturbation to the shortwave flux to mimic the attenuation of solar radiation by volcanic areosols associated with the 1991 Mt. Pinatubo eruption in the Philippines.
name: PinatuboSolarAttenuation
rationale: Reproduce the solar attenuation resulting from the 1991 eruption of Mt. Pinatubo, Philippines.
longName: Short Wave solar attenuation equivalent to the Mt. Pinatubo eruption.
keywords: VolMIP, Pinatubo, 1991, Solar attenuation, Short Wave radiative flux attentuation
